comment._content: NYT of Feb 16, 1913 has a piece on Picabia with several photos of his works and this photo of him in his studio. See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D04E0D81539E632A...

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Painters in the Studio, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
